name: 賴建宏
objective:
NodeMCU 32S and Arduino series modules and sensors are used as tools, and each case is developed in C language, using ready-made products and actual implementation, to understand the principle and characteristics of microprocessors:
1. Introduction to NodeMCU 32S
2. Sensor principle
3. Analog to Digital Converter
4. Light sensing, ultrasonic, gas concentration sensing, Barometer...etc.
5. Wi-Fi and Bluetooth
6. Application of public cloud platform and IFTTT
7. DC motor and servo motor
8. Display screen
9. (Scheduled) edge computing
schedule: The first to fifth weeks are the introduction of basic principles, the sixth week is IFTTT, and the seventh week to the end is the application of various integration projects.
scorePolicy:
Midterm project presentation: 30%
Final project presentation: 30%
Practices: 40%

All featured presentations must be uploaded to YouTube and public URL
